content.query:
create TABLE dbo.t1
 (
     id INT IDENTITY(1,1) not NULL
     ,name NVARCHAR(12)
 )
 WITH
 (
    DISTRIBUTION=HASH(name)
    ,CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
 )

 insert INTO dbo.t1
 values(NULL)

  insert INTO dbo.t1
 values('a')

 SELECT * FROM dbo.t1

 DBCC PDW_SHOWSPACEUSED('dbo.t1')

 set IDENTITY_INSERT dbo.t1 OFF
